products.name: SSD Kingston NV2 250GB M.2 PCIe NVMe Gen4
products.description: Kingston NV2 250GB M.2 PCIe NVMe Gen4 SSD is a high-capacity storage solution, with read/write speeds of up to 3,000/1,300MB/s, 3 - 4 times faster than SATA SSDs and 35 times faster compared to a traditional hard drive. NV2 drives consume less power, generate less heat, and have faster load times. Thanks to its useful performance and single-sided M.2 2280 (22x80mm) design, the NV2 drive becomes an ideal accessory for slim laptops and systems with limited capacity.
